Class MotorVehicle

java.lang.Object
MotorVehicle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Movable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Saab95, Volvo240
public abstract class MotorVehicle
extends java.lang.Object
implements Movable
Parent class, handles all types of cars Implements Movable for movement related issues
